recipe_text: Quantity; 450; Prepare 450 grams of chicken breasts| Measurement; 120; Measure out 120 grams of barbecue sauce| Measurement; 300; Measure out 300 grams of romaine lettuce, chopped| Measurement; 200; Measure out 200 grams of black beans, drained and rinsed| Measurement; 150; Measure out 150 grams of corn kernels| Measurement; 150; Measure out 150 grams of cherry tomatoes, halved| Measurement; 50; Measure out 50 grams of red onion, chopped| Measurement; 100; Measure out 100 grams of cheddar cheese, shredded| Measurement; 100; Measure out 100 grams of tortilla chips, crushed| Measurement; 120; Measure out 120 grams of ranch dressing| Untimed; None; Preheat grill to medium-high heat| Untimed; None; Grill chicken breasts, basting with barbecue sauce, until cooked through| Untimed; None; Let chicken rest, then slice into strips| Untimed; None; In a large bowl, combine romaine lettuce, black beans, corn, cherry tomatoes, red onion, cheddar cheese, and tortilla chips| Untimed; None; Top with grilled chicken strips| Untimed; None; Drizzle with ranch dressing| Finish; None; Serve immediately and enjoy!
title: BBQ Chicken Chopped Salad
